about_the_game:
Game temporarily closed, we are fixing the bugs that greatly spoil the experience


"In a futuristic reality, when you are sentenced to death, you can achieve your redemption by competing in the test of your life, 24 condemned will fight to be the first to reach the goal and thus obtain a new opportunity, if they are not reached before by the creatures that persecute them..."

Up to 24 players must reach the finish line, they have 5 minutes to do so and the first one to arrive wins, a sign will guide you throughout the game to know where to go, they will have to pass 3 levels:

MAZE

You will have to run through a maze and find the exit, the zombies can't run as fast as you but they know how to ambushe you unexpectedly.

LIBRARY

With great secrecy you must cross the library hiding from the zombies and without making noise. Be careful that someone close to you does not make noise or everything will end for both of you.

CAVE

Finally, a flooded cave, you must jump through the floating objects and quickly before they sink, get the key and open the door to freedom.
detailed_description:
Game temporarily closed, we are fixing the bugs that greatly spoil the experience


"In a futuristic reality, when you are sentenced to death, you can achieve your redemption by competing in the test of your life, 24 condemned will fight to be the first to reach the goal and thus obtain a new opportunity, if they are not reached before by the creatures that persecute them..."

Up to 24 players must reach the finish line, they have 5 minutes to do so and the first one to arrive wins, a sign will guide you throughout the game to know where to go, they will have to pass 3 levels:

MAZE

You will have to run through a maze and find the exit, the zombies can't run as fast as you but they know how to ambushe you unexpectedly.

LIBRARY

With great secrecy you must cross the library hiding from the zombies and without making noise. Be careful that someone close to you does not make noise or everything will end for both of you.

CAVE

Finally, a flooded cave, you must jump through the floating objects and quickly before they sink, get the key and open the door to freedom.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS / Linux
  • Processor: Intel core i7 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS / Linux
  • Processor: Intel core i7 6 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13.4
  • Processor: Intel core i7 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro Vega 20
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13.4
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon M1 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Scape Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit / Windows 8, 64-bit, Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: 64 bits 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: 64 bits 6 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A terrifying Party Royale that will fill you with tension, fear and frenzy, pure adrenaline like you have never experienced before.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
